title.rendered: Jarvee Linkedin Scraper as your HR assistant

content.rendered:
You have probably heard about Jarvee as being the only social media automation tool you’ll ever need. However, you probably haven’t heard that Jarvee can be your HR assistant as well, right?

That’s right, with Jarvee you can have an HR assistant that will follow your instructions and guidelines clearly and work as per your preferences.

You are probably wondering how this can be done. We will not keep you in anticipation anymore – with the Linkedin Profile Scraper tool your search for potential candidates will become faster, easier and more fun.

To find this awesome feature, you need first to add your LinkedIn account to Jarvee.

After you have added and validated your Linkedin account within Jarvee, you start with the search. When you go to the Profile Scraper tool, you will arrive on the Settings tab. On this tab, you can set up the settings related to the number of results you want to extract in a period of time and how fast you want this to be extracted. We always recommend not aggressive settings, some decent amount of extractions that will simulate human behavior.

The next tab that you can choose is the Sources tab and this is the tab where you will agree about the main parameters with your HR assistant. Here you can set what type of person you are looking for at the moment or set the places where you want to look for this person.

This search can be based on keyword search, it can be done in a specific group, you can use different types of Sales Navigator sources or even extract people from post reactions.

These are all the places where you would manually look for the potential candidate through LinkedIn, just this way the extraction will be done automatically, it will scrape and extract all the details for you. Then based on the details extracted about the users you will be able to further filter candidates that are more appropriate for the position you are searching for.

You will be able to see all extracted users listed on the Extracted Users tab. Now, Jarvee will extract all details related to these users that are available on Linkedin, based on the sources you have set.

Once the extraction is done and details about users are scraped, you will be able to see everything scraped on the Results tab. You can manually click on the EXPORT ALL button on this tab to get all the details sorted in a document, or you can set the settings so that results get extracted automatically based on your preferences.

Imagine how much time you or the person you would hire would need to manually do all this search and to collect all the details in some document or sheet. During this time, you can do other tasks and save your money and time.

Once you do the first round of screening users according to your own model, you can continue the process by contacting these users through Jarvee automatically, with the Jarvee Contact tool.

These tools will make your search for candidates easier and faster and it will cost you much less than hiring a real person to do all of these tasks for you. Have you tried it yet?
